version_description:
- iOS 11 compatibility fixes
- allow retrying failed messages
- improved performance for balance display
- user migration fixes

- iOS 11 compatibility fixes
- start new chat with favourites from chats view
- support for pasting of passphrase to sign in
- updated tabbar icons, correct unread message badges
- fix state of payment requests
- design spec fixes in Browse, Profile, Messages, My QR
- use native image picker
- binary size reduction tweaks

- Improve app loading behaviour and splash screen
- Show offline alert view
- Support browse caching
- URL button on browse bugfix
- New chat buttons.

In this version:
- alert presentation fix;
- chat ui improvements.

In this version we:
- fixed crash happening sometimes on Currencies picker;
- improved the way post backup database issue is handled, affecting users who restored the app on different device via iCloud.

In this version we:
- force chat registration if a user is not registered
- try to detect corrupted database file if a user experienced the chat loss issue
- support personal message signing on web view
- show estimated gas costs before a transaction is approved and executed

In this version we:
- process potential errors while sending network cost information request;
- fixed UI issues affecting iPhone X.

- featured URLs on Search page
- expanded web3 compatibility
- Sign In using 12-word seed from compatible wallets
- native group chat functionality

- easier URL input in Search
- increased web3 compatibility

- simplified profile views
- new payment flow and transaction confirmations
- web3 navigation & compatibility improvements
- better button handling in chat

- New redesigned wallet now features native support for ERC20 and ERC721 tokens, in addition to Ether.
- Popular tokens and collectibles you own will show up automatically. Support for custom tokens coming soon.
New redesigned ĐApp browsing experience! It's now easier to discover new ĐApps and explore the decentralized web.

- increased web3 compatibility
- miscellaneous bug fixes

• New chat functionality - easily search and discover groups, users, and bots
• Improved iPhone X support
• Now able to mute chat notifications
• Improved DApp browser compatibility

- Fix for inconsistent state when accounts are created by an offline device
- Improvements to offline handling

- Minor bug fixes
- Informational message for users with older versions of iOS

Hi, fellow Ethereum HODLers! Check out what’s new in this version:
• Added ability to add custom ERC20 tokens
• Added ability to switch to other tabs while browsing
• Added support for test networks - Kovan, Rinkeby and Ropsten
• Added support for multiple wallets derived from the same recovery phrase
• Improved user experience
• Various other bug fixes

If you’re enjoying using this app, please leave us a review!

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at contact@toshi.org
You can also find us on Twitter: @Toshi

Hi, fellow Ethereum HODLers! Check out what’s new in this version:
• Various bug fixes
If you’re enjoying using this app, please leave us a review!

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at contact@toshi.org
You can also find us on Twitter: @Toshi

Hi, fellow Ethereum fans! Check out what’s new in this version:
• Big security upgrade: You can now set up a biometric (Touch ID/Face ID) or passcode authentication for your wallet for your privacy and security.
• Using biometric authentication also enables the use of Secure Enclave technology, which makes the storage of your wallet keys much more secure.

If you’re enjoying using this app, please leave us a review!

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at contact@toshi.org
You can also find us on Twitter: @Toshi

Hi, fellow Ethereum HODLers! Check out what’s new in this version:
• Bug fixes and performance enhancements

If you’re enjoying using this app, please leave us a review!

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at contact@toshi.org
You can also find us on Twitter: @Toshi

Toshi is now Coinbase Wallet! Your favorite crypto wallet and DApp browser is now officially part of the Coinbase family.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

Now, bookmark your favorite DApps on Coinbase Wallet! We’ve added bookmarks to Coinbase Wallet so you can save the DApps you use and see them on your Browser home screen.

We’ve also launched the DApp explorer - your home base to discover the latest and greatest DApps on the decentralized web. The DApp explorer is now the default home screen in Coinbase Wallet’s browser.

We’ve also made some usability improvements - you can now easily switch between the browser and the wallet, without leaving the dapp you’re currently using.

Finally, we’re removing chat from Coinbase Wallet. We plan to make it even easier to send crypto to friends. Stay tuned for more updates!

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

A new onboarding flow helps you get your wallet all set up in just a minute - choose your Wallet username, activate biometric security, and backup your recovery phrase.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

A new onboarding flow helps you get your wallet all set up in just a minute - choose your Wallet username, activate biometric security, and backup your recovery phrase.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

- Stability fixes

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

Coinbase Wallet has a fresh look, and some great new features!

We've redesigned Wallet to create the best crypto experience. New features include:
• A brand new look for your Wallet screens
• Now, see the total value of your tokens conveniently at the top of your wallet
• All ERC20 tokens will now show up automatically - no more adding custom tokens!
• We show you the fiat values for your tokens whenever available
• Brand new look and feel for your Collectibles - bigger and better views
• Integration with RareBits and OpenSea to populate images for all your collectibles
• Better gas price estimates
• Improved ERC20 token logo library

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

Coinbase Wallet now supports Ethereum Classic (ETC)!

We’ve also improved reliability for decentralized apps (dapps), and improved currency localization for our international users.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

You can now send and receive crypto right from your home screen! We’ve made it easier to send, receive, and discover all the assets that Coinbase Wallet supports.

We’ve also introduced simpler and easier app lock settings to keep your funds safe - choose whether you want to use your biometrics or passcode to access the app, approve transactions, or both.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

• Bug fixes and stability enhancements

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

• Bug fixes and stability enhancements

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

Introducing Bitcoin support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user a Bitcoin wallet. Our Bitcoin wallet supports both SegWit for low fees as well as Legacy addresses for maximum compatibility.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet

Introducing Bitcoin support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user a Bitcoin wallet. Our Bitcoin wallet supports both SegWit for low fees as well as Legacy addresses for maximum compatibility.

We've also improved fee estimation for Segwit transactions in this update.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet
The easiest and most secure crypto wallet with support for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, ERC20 tokens and ERC721 Collectibles. Take control of your crypto and explore the decentralized web.

New feature alert! You can now back up your Wallet’s private keys to iCloud with Coinbase Wallet. This new feature provides a safeguard for users, helping you avoid losing your funds if you lose your device or misplace your recovery phrase.

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com
You can also find us on Twitter: @CoinbaseWallet
The easiest and most secure crypto wallet with support for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ethereum Classic, ERC20 tokens and ERC721 Collectibles. Take control of your crypto and explore the decentralized web.

Introducing Bitcoin Cash support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user a Bitcoin Cash wallet. Our Bitcoin Cash wallet supports both CashAddr as well as Legacy addresses for maximum compatibility.

Introducing Litecoin support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user a Litecoin wallet. Our Litecoin wallet supports both SegWit as well as Legacy addresses for maximum compatibility.

You can now link your Coinbase.com account to your Coinbase Wallet app! Once your Coinbase account is linked, you can easily transfer crypto to your Wallet app with just a couple of clicks, anytime you need it.

You can now link your Coinbase.com account to your Coinbase Wallet app! Once your Coinbase account is linked, you can easily transfer crypto to your Wallet app with just a couple of clicks, anytime you need it.

Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can now link your Coinbase.com account to your Coinbase Wallet app! Once your Coinbase account is linked, you can easily transfer crypto to your Wallet app with just a couple of clicks, anytime you need it.

Fixed a send bug affecting certain locales
Introducing XRP support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user an XRP wallet.

Introducing XRP support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user an XRP wallet.

Fixed a localization issue for Coinbase Connect sends

Introducing XRP support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user an XRP wallet.

Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
Introducing Stellar Lumens (XLM) support on Coinbase Wallet! With this release, we’re giving every Wallet user an Stellar Lumens (XLM) wallet.

• Bug fixes

Having problems with the app or have suggestions to make it better? Let us know at wallet.support@coinbase.com

Introducing transaction history for Ethereum, and all ERC20 tokens. We’re working on adding transaction history for all our other coins as well. You can now also scan QR codes with just one tap from the Wallet homescreen.

Wow! Much Coin! So Crypto!
Announcing support for Dogecoin (DOGE) on Coinbase Wallet!

Introducing a brand new experience for sending crypto. Sending crypto to friends, exchanges, and other wallets is now easier and more delightful than ever before.
Adding support for Compound wrapped BTC (cWBTC).
Improvements to transaction signing, coin sorting order, and wallet recovery flows

You can now send crypto using short human-friendly addresses instead of traditional long addresses. We're excited to launch support for sending to Coinbase Wallet usernames like @walletfan, and Ethereum Name Service (ENS) addresses like walletfan.eth.

Also, we've made it much easier to send crypto back to your linked Coinbase account with just a few taps.

Introducing DeFi interest. You can now lend out your crypto to DeFi smart contracts like Compound and dYdX and earn interest.

You can now convert Ethereum ERC20 tokens like USDC, wBTC, DAI, UNI, YFI and more from right within Coinbase Wallet!

You can now convert Ethereum ERC20 tokens like USDC, wBTC, DAI, UNI, YFI and more from right within Coinbase Wallet! Also introducing adjustable miner fees for Ethereum, ERC20 token and dapp transactions! Pick from Slow, Normal, and Fast settings or set your own Custom settings.

You can now convert Ethereum ERC20 tokens like USDC, wBTC, DAI, UNI, YFI and more from right within Coinbase Wallet! Also introducing adjustable miner fees for Ethereum, ERC20 token and dapp transactions! Pick from Slow, Normal, and Fast settings or set your own Custom settings.
Improved warnings when miner fees are higher than usual
Added native support for the Aave lend protocol
Squashed some bugs and refactored some code.
Introducing adjustable miner fees for Ethereum, ERC20 token and dapp transactions! Pick from Slow, Normal, and Fast settings or set your own Custom settings.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
You can now purchase cryptocurrencies from Coinbase right within Coinbase Wallet! This new feature is available to customers in every country where Coinbase supports card payments.
Introducing beta support for Optimism’s Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solution. We’ve also added support for NFTs & Collectibles in GIF format.
